titleStmt.title: Grant Green to James F. Robinson
CWG8697

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons, Remissions, and Respites, 1862-1863

body.p:
Auditor's Office, Kentucky,
Frankfort, 2nd Febry, 1863
, Esq.:
Dear Sir:
His Excellency
James F Robinson
Sir

Judgment was obtained against the Sheriff of Nicholas Co. (A J Banta) for balance ^of $2603 65/100^ and on the of said County ^for 1861^ at the February Term 1862 of the Franklin Circuit Court and damages ^obtained^ amounting to $520 73/100 -- The whole of the principal interest and costs has been paid -- and from conversations with persons from Nicholas I am satisfied that it was impossible to collect the revenue & pay it in by the time required by law -- Mr. Fetz Monger a highly respectable gentleman and able lawyer from Nicholas County will give you a statement of the facts as they existed in his County, and I hope you will give the parties such relief as you think they are entitled to --

Franklin Cir Ct
$520.73. } Damages
Sheriff Nicholas Co.
Remission Issd
Feby 2. 1863
